about_the_game:
Originally released in 1984, Duck Shoot brought the fun and frustration of funfair-style shooting games to the Commodore 64 and VIC-20 home computers. Now, relive those days in this remastered emulated version.

Contains both the Commodore 64 and VIC-20 versions.

Gameplay

It's a classic shooting gallery! Try to rack up as many points as you can by shooting ducks, bunnies, owls, and plates. Keep an eye on your ammo, as you have limited bullets, and watch out for the ducks who spring to live and fly down to try and eat your bullets right out of the UI!


This enhanced version introduces a number of modern features to this retro classic, including:

  • Saving/loading the game at any point
  • Support for most modern game controllers
  • Full control remapping
  • Image scaling and smoothing options

name: Duck Shoot (C64/VIC-20)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 100 MB RAM
  • Storage: 20 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: In this classic shooting gallery, originally released for Commodore home computers in 1984, try to rack up as many points as you can by shooting ducks, bunnies, owls, and plates. Watch out for the ducks who spring to live and fly down to try and eat your bullets!
